title: Neopets Fans ‘Care Less’ About Crypto, CEO Says
description: World of Neopia CEO Dominic Law told Decrypt that the game studio has “scarce resources” despite raising $4 million earlier this year.

title: Reddit’s MOONS, BRICKS tokens surge on Kraken listing
description:
Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken announced the listing of two Reddit cryptocurrency tokens — MOONS and BRICKS — on Aug. 7. Kraken said users can trade the two cryptocurrencies on Kraken and Kraken Pro, on spot and futures markets, and through USD and EUR trading pairs. The company also said that it will enable trading on the […]

The post Reddit’s MOONS, BRICKS tokens surge on Kraken listing appeared first on CryptoSlate.
